body_content.explanation: used to describe a person whose gender was said at birth to be male but who identifies more with being female than male:
examples: She is the only member of the team who is openly transfeminine.
They identify as a transfeminine non-binary person.

body_content.explanation: relating to people whose gender was said at birth to be male but who identify more with being female than male:
examples: She found a specialist who helped her learn more about transfeminine health.
Facial feminization is one of several transfeminine surgeries available.
